source:
%%pyspark
#loading applications.csv to dataframe
df = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/applications.csv', format='csv'
## If header exists uncomment line below
, header=True
)

%%pyspark
#loading CohortTableList.parquet to dataframe
dg = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/CohortTableList.parquet', format='parquet')
dg = dg.drop('Title')

#loading CohortForm.parquet to dataframe
dh = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/CohortForm.parquet', format='parquet')

#loading Talentlist.parquet to dataframe
dj = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/TalentList.parquet', format='parquet')

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

# removing delimiters, change the case to lower, and directly apply to column Job in dataframe 
df = df.withColumn("Job",lower(translate(col("Job"),"./–!-() ","")))

# removing delimiters, change the case to lower, rename JobDescription to Job, and directly apply now 
dg = dg.withColumn("Job",lower(translate(col("JobDescription"),"./–!-() ","")) )

# extract Year and Week in AppliedOrSourcedDate from applications dataframe
df = df.withColumn("Year", year(to_date(df.AppliedOrSourcedDate,"M/d/y"))) \
.withColumn("Week", weekofyear(to_date(df.AppliedOrSourcedDate, "M/d/y")))

#<-- join tables to create a flat file applications dataframe-->

#select two columns in TalentList
dj = dj.select("Id", "Title")
dj = dj.withColumnRenamed("Title", "AcctMngr")
#join tables CohortTableList and TalentList
dq = dg.join(dj, dg.AcctMngrId==dj.Id,"left").drop(dj.Id)
#select two columns in CohortForm
dh = dh.select("Id", "Title")
dh = dh.withColumnRenamed("Title","CohortName")
#join tables CohortTableList and CohortForm
da = dq.join(dh, dq.CohortNameId==dh.Id,"left")
da = da.distinct()
#join tables Applications and CohortTableList
ds = df.join(da,["Job"])
##ds = ds.withColumnRenamed("Title","CohortName")
##display(ds.limit(5))

# re-initiate TalentList to dataframe
dj = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/TalentList.parquet', format='parquet')
dj = dj.select("Title")
dj = dj.withColumnRenamed("Title","TA")

#join tables Applications and TalentList
ds = ds.join(dj,ds.SourceSubType==dj.TA,"left")

#choose between fields to impose if sourcesubtype is equal to TA field in TalentList
ds = ds.withColumn("FinalTA", when(ds.SourceSubType == ds.TA,ds.SourceSubType).otherwise(ds.AcctMngr))


#re-intitiate an instance of TalentList to dataframe
dj = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/TalentList.parquet', format='parquet')
dj = dj.select("Title","PictureURL")
dj = dj.withColumnRenamed("Title","TA")

#join Applications and TalentList dataframes
ds = ds.join(dj,ds.FinalTA==dj.TA,"left").drop(ds.TA)
ds = ds.withColumnRenamed("PictureURL","FinalTAPicUrl")
#<-----
#drop unwanted fields that occured during the join
ds = ds.drop("ContentTypeID", "ContentType","Modified","Created", "CreatedById", "ModifiedById", \
"Owshiddenversion", "Version", "Path", "ComplianceAssetId")
#<-- end of join tables to create a flat file applications dataframe-->

#define HTD terms from Stage column in Applications dataframe
ds = ds.withColumn("TrackerType", when((ds.Stage == "Sourced") | (ds.Stage == "Applied") , "Reach")
.when((ds.Stage == "Screen") | (ds.Stage == "Assessment"), "Test") 
.when((ds.Stage == "Interview"), "Interview") 
.when((ds.Stage == "Shortlisted") | (ds.Stage == "Offer"), "Offer") 
.when((ds.Stage == "Hired"), "Conversion") 
.otherwise(""))

#create HTD (Reach, Test, Interview, Offer, Conversion) columns and assign values 1 on parameters TrackerType 
# and CohortName
ds = ds.withColumn("Reach", when((ds.TrackerType == "Reach") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Test", when((ds.TrackerType == "Test") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Interview", when((ds.TrackerType == "Interview") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Offer", when((ds.TrackerType == "Offer") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Conversion", when((ds.TrackerType == "Conversion") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \

#drop columns
ds = ds.drop("id" )
ds = ds.distinct()

#save Applications flat file dataframe as a table in capstone lake database
ds = ds.repartition(1)
ds.write.mode("overwrite") \
.saveAsTable("capstone.applications")

#re-initiate CohortTableList dataframe and save as a table in capstone lake database
dg = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/CohortTableList.parquet', format='parquet')
dg.write.mode("overwrite") \
.saveAsTable("capstone.CohortTableList")

#re-initiate CohortForm dataframe and save as a table in capstone lake database
dh = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/CohortForm.parquet', format='parquet')
dh.write.mode("overwrite") \
.saveAsTable("capstone.CohortForm")

#re-initiate TalentList dataframe and save as a table in capstone lake database
dj = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/TalentList.parquet', format='parquet')
dj.write.mode("overwrite") \
.saveAsTable("capstone.TalentList")

##Drop  table in the default database
##%%sql
##DROP TABLE applications
